app_tagline: Crisis-ready operations, downloads, and preparedness in one place.
hero_subtitle: This portal consolidates app builds, transport matrix, version records, and community preparedness playbooks.
downloads_subtitle: Edition bundles are generated locally and published with SHA-256 checksums.
downloads_release_only: Only final install packages are listed in this catalog.
downloads_filter_empty: No packages available for this filter.
matrix_subtitle: Live matrix data from assets/data/matrix.json with implementation status per platform.
versions_subtitle: Manifest timestamp plus direct access to legacy operational pages.
prep_subtitle: Operational steps by scenario for flood, fire, earthquake, storm, evacuation, sheltering, communications, mental health, and recovery.
scenario_flood_steps: Move to higher ground immediately|Avoid walking or driving through floodwater|Protect documents, medicine, and communication devices in waterproof bags
scenario_fire_steps: Evacuate early if smoke or orders are present|Use N95 or cloth barrier for smoke if available|Close doors/windows before leaving and report your route
scenario_quake_steps: Drop, cover, and hold on during shaking|After shaking, check injuries and gas/electrical hazards|Expect aftershocks and move away from damaged structures
scenario_storm_steps: Shelter in an interior room away from glass|Charge radios, phones, and battery packs early|Keep weather alerts and local emergency channels monitored
scenario_evac_steps: Define meeting points and accountability list|Use pre-planned routes with fallback alternatives|Carry go-bags with IDs, meds, water, and communication kit
scenario_shelter_steps: Separate zones: medical, sleeping, logistics, sanitation|Track arrivals/departures and urgent medical cases|Post visible rules, contact numbers, and hygiene schedule
scenario_comms_steps: Assign one node as synchronization anchor|Use short, structured messages with priority tags|Repeat critical alerts through at least two independent channels
scenario_mental_steps: Use calm voice, clear information, and predictable routines|Identify high-stress signals and rotate responders|Provide peer support and emergency lines when available
scenario_recovery_steps: Record damage with photos, location, and timestamps|Track aid requests, deliveries, and unresolved needs|Plan phased restoration: safety, utilities, livelihoods, follow-up care
refs_subtitle: Use these sources for authoritative guidance and updates.
footer_text: Initial language uses location hints when available. Your preference is stored locally and synced by Node ID.
profile_subtitle: Persist operational preferences on this device and on the server profile.
profile_gps_help: When enabled, coordinates are published to mesh peers for distance and routing awareness.
profile_sync_error: Saved locally, but server sync failed.
